attributes.action: investigate the goverment for using taxpayers money During the EU referendum
attributes.background: Investigate the government for using 9 million pounds of taxpayers money to help pro remain groups during the 2016 EU referendum by sending leaflets to every household telling my then to vote remain.Even though the government lost it helped pro remain groups and was not fair play

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
